content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSiteDnsTargets path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/dns/targets content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get cname targets
desc a sites hostname should point to these cname targets in order for traffic to be sent through stackpaths edge nodes
responses
200
cdngetsitednstargetsresponse
type obj
addresses
type str
desc the requested dns cname targets

a sites hostname should point to these cname targets in order for traffic to be sent through stackpaths edge nodes
desc the response from a request to retrieve a cdn sites dns cname targets
title: 7_Configuration_GetSiteDnsTargets_44.json
